title: Single team - In Market
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ A user with a single team in-market entitlement
AND the user is physically located in the in-market region
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user selects a game tile of a game in which their entitled single team is involved
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The in-market feed should be selectable

AND

+ The in-market feed should be playable


AND

+ The other team's feed should have a lock icon

title: Lock Icon
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

+ The user is signed into an account that is not entitled to view one or both broadcast feeds
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user selects the game tile from the Hero, Games Carousel and Games page
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The lock icon will display on the broadcast option button that the user is unable to launch

title: MVPD Pill
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

The user is signed into an account that is not a free account (At Bat, Single Team, MLB All, Single Team + MLB.tv)

AND 

A stream is available that requires the user to link their account and authenticate through MVPD
custom_steps:
WHEN

The user selects the game tile from the Hero, Games Carousel and Games page
custom_expected:
THEN 

An MVPD Required pill is displayed

title: Blackout Pill
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

The user is signed into an entitled account while in a location with a local, national, or international blackout
custom_steps:
WHEN

The user selects the game tile from the Hero, Games Carousel and Games page
custom_expected:
THEN 

The user will observe the blackout message stating the game is unavailable in their area

title: Game in Preview State
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ An entitled user views a game tile in the preview state (Broadcasts are not available yet)
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user selects the game tile from the Hero, Today on MLB.tv Carousel, and Games page
custom_expected:
THEN

+ A modal with broadcast options is displayed

AND

+ The broadcasts are not selectable/User cannot launch

title: Condensed Game Launch
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ An entitled or free user navigates to the feed picker menu when selecting a game tile for an archived game
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The Condensed Game option is launched (VOD)
custom_expected:
THEN

+ A compact highlight VOD will begin playback from the start of the game

AND

+ The user is able to utilize player controls

title: Game Recap Launch
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ An entitled or free user has navigated to the feed select menu by tapping on a game tile for an archived game
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user selects the Game Recap option
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The game recap VOD will begin playback from the beginning

AND

+ The user is able to utilize player controls

title: Entitled User
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

+ An entitled MLB.TV user has navigated to the feed picker for a live or archived game

AND

+ The user is not blacked out of viewing the game
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user launches a broadcast option from the feed selector once a game tile is selected
custom_expected:
THEN

+ Playback will begin from the live point (If user selects Watch Live from the feed picker)

OR

+ Playback will begin at the last watched point of the stream (If the user selects Resume from the feed picker)

OR

+ Playback will begin from the beginning of the stream (If the user selects Watch From The Beginning from the feed picker)
